item.title: Creekside PTA activity
item.description: February 2018 PTA statement PTA background information sheet PTA presentation Statement on Rail Operations Maintenance Facility The Creekside PTA expresses its concern about the potential negative impacts of a Rail Operations Maintenance Facility (ROMF) in such close proximity to a school, as well as the lack of substantive communication with the school community during the planning process. The Creekside PTA calls upon local leaders to immediately identify representatives to join a formal body that will work together to resolve concerns around potential impacts on student safety and quality of the learning environment.

item.title: Timeline
item.description: At no point was there ever any effort to directly contact parents, guardians or teaching staff at Creekside Elementary.
